CustomProfile.Description: Arcana Heart 2 for NESiCAxLive is the first entry in the Arcana Heart series developed by Examu after acquiring the rights from Yuki Enterprise. Running on the eX‑Board platform and later NESiCAxLive, this 2008 2D fighter introduces six new characters, each paired with a unique Arcana spirit that modifies their moveset. New mechanics include Arcana Blast, which grants temporary invulnerability; Arcana Homing to quickly close distance; and Critical Heart super attacks. It retains the all‑female cast and allows players to customize play style through choice of Arcana.
